channel.title: Transactions on Priceless Trainwreck
channel.description: Recent content in Transactions on Priceless Trainwreck

item.title: Mar 2020 Set 1
item.description: Mar 2020 Set 1 https://www.millenium.org/news/360471.html Star Citizen : Interview de Dan Trufin au Bar Citizen de Li√®ge 2020 According to Dan, refueling is more an activity than a full career. This involves buying fuel (or making it), possibly responding to a distress call, and transferring fuel from one vessel to another. Chris Robert wants the connection between the ships to be visible . There will therefore be a pole as for supply planes.
